definitions.definition: Used in indicating a thing or person which has two or more roles, functions, or natures, or which has changed from one to another.
examples: He built a bus- cum -greenhouse that made a bold statement, but the plants in it didn't live very long.
But instead of being a salesperson cum barista cum waitress merely serving the wordsmiths, I'm one of them, reading her latest baby out loud.

main_definition: Used in indicating a thing or person which has two or more roles, functions, or natures, or which has changed from one to another.
